languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс бросает на вас усталый, почти что раздраженный взгляд.{/n} "Миллионы безвременно почивших мертвецов когда-то тоже пренебрегали устранением скрытой угрозы. Вам дорога ваша династия? Ценой за леность и трусость может быть она. Проведите ритуал".

{n}Heinrix casts a tired and almost irritated glance at you.{/n} "There have been millions of people who neglected to remove a hidden threat — and were themselves removed from existence before their due time as a result. Do you value your dynasty? For that may well become the price of indolence and cowardice. Perform the ritual."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс бросает на вас усталый, почти что раздраженный взгляд.{/n} "Миллионы безвременно почивших мертвецов когда-то тоже пренебрегали устранением скрытой угрозы. Вам дорога ваша династия? Ценой за леность и трусость может быть она. Проведите ритуал".

Do you value your dynasty? For that may become the price of indolence and cowardice. Perform the ritual."

Do you value your dynasty? For that may well become the price of indolence and cowardice. Perform the ritual."

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは疲れたように、どこか苛立たしげに一瞥なさる。{/n}「隠された脅威を取り除かずに過ごし、本来の時を待たずに存在を消されました者は、これまでに何百万とおります。ご自分の王朝を大切になさいますか？怠惰の代償が、それになるやもしれません。儀式をお執り行いください」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix casts a tired and almost irritated glance at you.{/n} "There have been millions of people who neglected to remove a hidden threat — and were themselves removed from existence before their due time as a result. Do you value your dynasty? For that may well become the price of indolence and cowardice. Perform the ritual."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは疲れたように、どこか苛立たしげに一瞥なさる。{/n}「隠された脅威を取り除かずに過ごし、本来の時を待たずに存在を消されました者は、これまでに何百万とおります。ご自分の王朝を大切になさいますか？怠惰の代償が、それになるやもしれません。儀式をお執り行いください」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix te dirige una mirada cansada y casi irritada.{/n} «Millones de personas han ignorado amenazas ocultas, y como consecuencia han dejado de existir antes de lo que les correspondía. ¿Valore en algo su dinastía? Porque perderla podría ser una de las consecuencias de la indolencia y la cobardía. Celebre el ritual».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix casts a tired and almost irritated glance at you.{/n} "There have been millions of people who neglected to remove a hidden threat — and were themselves removed from existence before their due time as a result. Do you value your dynasty? For that may well become the price of indolence and cowardice. Perform the ritual."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix te dirige una mirada cansada y casi irritada.{/n} «Millones de personas han ignorado amenazas ocultas, y como consecuencia han dejado de existir antes de lo que les correspondía. ¿Valore en algo su dinastía? Porque perderla podría ser una de las consecuencias de la indolencia y la cobardía. Celebre el ritual».

languages.text: {n}Heinrix vous lance un regard fatigué, à la limite de l'irritation.{/n} « Des millions de gens ont préféré fermer les yeux plutôt que de se débarrasser d'une menace cachée ; et qu'y ont-ils gagné, si ce n'est une mort prématurée ? Votre dynastie n'a-t-elle donc aucune valeur à vos yeux ? Vous êtes sur le point de la perdre, par nonchalance et par lâcheté. Accomplissez le rituel. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix casts a tired and almost irritated glance at you.{/n} "There have been millions of people who neglected to remove a hidden threat — and were themselves removed from existence before their due time as a result. Do you value your dynasty? For that may well become the price of indolence and cowardice. Perform the ritual."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vous lance un regard fatigué, à la limite de l'irritation.{/n} « Des millions de gens ont préféré fermer les yeux plutôt que de se débarrasser d'une menace cachée ; et qu'y ont-ils gagné, si ce n'est une mort prématurée ? Votre dynastie n'a-t-elle donc aucune valeur à vos yeux ? Vous êtes sur le point de la perdre, par nonchalance et par lâcheté. Accomplissez le rituel. »

languages.text: {n}海因里希向你投来了疲惫的目光，甚至带着恼怒的意味。{/n}“千千万万的人对隐藏的威胁熟视无睹，最终惨遭劫难。你重视你的王朝吗？因为你的懈怠和怯懦可能会毁了它，快执行仪式吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix casts a tired and almost irritated glance at you.{/n} "There have been millions of people who neglected to remove a hidden threat — and were themselves removed from existence before their due time as a result. Do you value your dynasty? For that may well become the price of indolence and cowardice. Perform the ritual."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希向你投来了疲惫的目光，甚至带着恼怒的意味。{/n}“千千万万的人对隐藏的威胁熟视无睹，最终惨遭劫难。你重视你的王朝吗？因为你的懈怠和怯懦可能会毁了它，快执行仪式吧。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix wirft dir einen müden, beinahe genervten Blick zu.{/n} "Es gab schon Millionen von Leuten, die sich weigerten, eine verborgene Bedrohung zu beseitigen ... und deshalb selbst lange vor ihrer Zeit ausgelöscht wurden. Schätzt Ihr Eure Dynastie? Sie könnte nämlich der Preis für Trägheit und Feigheit sein. Führt das Ritual durch."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix casts a tired and almost irritated glance at you.{/n} "There have been millions of people who neglected to remove a hidden threat — and were themselves removed from existence before their due time as a result. Do you value your dynasty? For that may well become the price of indolence and cowardice. Perform the ritual."

Schätzt Ihr Eure Dynastie? Sie könnte nämlich der Preis für Trägheit und Feigheit sein. Führt das Ritual durch."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix sana yorgun ve neredeyse bıkkın bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Gizli bir tehdidi savuşturmayı ihmal eden milyonlarca oldu. Bunun bedelini vakitleri gelmeden bu dünyadan silinerek ödediler. Hanedanlığın zerre kadar değeri yok mu? Ataletin ve korkaklığın bedeli, hanedanlığın sonu olabilir. Ayini gerçekleştirmeliyiz."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix casts a tired and almost irritated glance at you.{/n} "There have been millions of people who neglected to remove a hidden threat — and were themselves removed from existence before their due time as a result. Do you value your dynasty? For that may well become the price of indolence and cowardice. Perform the ritual."
